name: Vierling, Admrx., v. Ellwood City Federal Savings & Loan Association (et al., Appellant)

parties: Vierling, Admrx., v. Ellwood City Federal Savings & Loan Association (et al., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Sohn.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Vierling, Admrx., v. Ellwood City Federal Savings & Loan Association (et al., Appellant).
Argued March 26, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Lee E. Whitmire, Jr., with him Swaney & Lucas, for appellant.
Robert L. Orr, with him Reed & Ewing, for appellee.
April 14, 1947:
